column4: which one will give me ubuntu desktop is it ubuntu server or ubuntu enterprise cloud

can any body help me here
start installing
you will get Ubuntu Desktop Edition from http://www.ubuntu.com
then you can use it for installation

dont worry we are here for helo
open up Oracle Virtual Box
did you start it?
ok now what do you see?
are you on the live desktop now?
i mean did the DVD take you to the desktop instance of Ubuntu?
or its still in the boot process/
that means you are using a server edition disk
its not meant for desktop use,
it will work for you but you wont get a graphical desktop
yes exactly
yes you will get a terminal
if you are comfortable with terminal then you can continue with the installation
